events.text: How are you staying busy during these times?

choices.text: I'm picking up all sorts of weird hobbies
I mainly help my parents. What about you?

events.text: Haha... Weird Hobbies? I guess I did too.

choices.text: Yes I learnt gardening during these times
Yes I played too much video games
Yes I read a lot of books about Astrophysics
